h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Tridacna Pendant Location
content: This wall can be broken by the boss' attacks or a really powerful attack from one of the Transformation Spells after the fight. You can then take the Loong Scales to the Sand Wall and enter the secret area. Our video guide on how to get behind the Sand Wall below will help you out. You can also use our pages for the individual bosses, locations, and items linked above
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Tridacna_Pendant.md', within the main section titled 'Tridacna Pendant', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Tridacna Pendant Location'.
The content is as follows:
This wall can be broken by the boss' attacks or a really powerful attack from one of the Transformation Spells after the fight. You can then take the Loong Scales to the Sand Wall and enter the secret area. Our video guide on how to get behind the Sand Wall below will help you out. You can also use our pages for the individual bosses, locations, and items linked above
